properties.name: itemList
properties.description: A list of items that can be used as input.

properties.name: mode
properties.description: Whenever the item gets consumed or not. Default is `destroy`.

properties.name: flags
properties.description: Provides information about how the recipe impacts the items used in the crafting recipe or identified as valid items.

properties.name: mappers
properties.description: Used to associated a specific input item to another specific output item.

properties.name: overlayMapper
properties.description: If provided, this input entry is used to determine the overlayMapper of the `craftRecipe`.

properties.name: tags
properties.description: Tags are used to determine which items can be used as input.

properties.name: fluidList
properties.description: A list of fluids that can be used as input.

properties.name: categories
properties.description: A category of fluid used to determine which fluids can be used as input.

properties.name: flags
properties.description: Flags determine how the fluid is impacted during the recipe or identified.

properties.name: singleValue
properties.description: A single fluid value defining the output fluid.
